mapper.select: SELECT activity.id as id, COUNT(user_id) as userJoinedNum, title, start_date, end_date, deadline, location, price, capacity, images, additional_info, description, payment, activity.created_at FROM activity LEFT JOIN activity_responses ON activity.id = activity_responses.id WHERE activity.deadline >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND activity.deleted_at IS null GROUP BY activity.id, title, start_date, end_date, deadline, location, price, capacity, images, additional_info, description, payment, activity.created_at ORDER BY activity.id
SELECT * FROM activity_responses WHERE user_id = #{userID} AND act_id = #{actID} AND deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 1

SELECT activity.id, title, start_date, end_date, location, price, capacity, images, additional_info, description, payment, activity.created_at FROM activity_responses RIGHT JOIN activity ON activity.id = activity_responses.id WHERE activity_responses.user_id = #{userID} AND activity.start_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND activity.deleted_at IS NULL AND activity_responses.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY activity.id
